metadata.title: CVE-2016-7506 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was observed in Sp_replace_regexpfunction of Artifex Software, Inc. MuJS before5000749f5afe3b956fc916e407309de840997f4a. A successful exploitation of thisissue can lead to code execution or denial of service condition.

criterions.comment: mupdf package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
